nodes.bodyText: Why do you need the non-null filter? The Class.isInstance will already filter out null values.
Good point, I can remove it.
Perhaps Bndtools should be in the name so people can associate seeing this with Bndtools?
Agreed, that would let people know where it is coming from when they encounter it.
I don't see where this private method selectProject is ever called.
It can be removed, I just left it in case we needed both mechanisms for some reason.
Does this hiding of the temp project also work with the new Bndtools Explorer view?
